roleSelection.title: How you go dey use Fixit?
roleSelection.description: Choose how you go use FIXIT. You fit change your selection anytime for your profile settings.

vehicle_owner.title: Vehicle Owner
vehicle_owner.description: For personal car monitoring and maintenance.

fleet_manager.title: Fleet Manager
fleet_manager.description: To manage and track many vehicles.

mechanic.title: Mechanic
mechanic.description: To receive and handle repair requests.

forgotPasswordScreen.title: You Forget Password
forgotPasswordScreen.instruction: Put your email so you fit reset your password. We go send you one OTP to make new password.

stayConnectedScreen.title: Stay connected and ready
stayConnectedScreen.description: Open notification settings so you fit get job alerts and status updates. Also, allow location access for work and workshop visibility.

createNewPasswordScreen.title: Create new password
createNewPasswordScreen.instruction: Enter strong password so your account go secure well. Pick secure password you go fit remember.
createNewPasswordScreen.resetFailed: Password reset no work. Abeg try again.
createNewPasswordScreen.successDesc: You fit log in now with your new password.

uploadProfilePictureScreen.title: Upload profile picture
uploadProfilePictureScreen.instruction: Put correct photo of yourself so vehicle owners and fleet managers go trust you. Profile picture dey help clients know you and make your profile fine well well.

verifyCodeScreen.verificationInstruction: For your security, abeg put the 4-digit code we send give {{email}}
verifyCodeScreen.resetInstruction: Abeg put the 4-digit code we send give {{email}} so you fit reset your password
verifyCodeScreen.invalidCodeError: Verification code no correct. Abeg try again.
verifyCodeScreen.codeResentSuccess: New verification code don enter your email
verifyCodeScreen.resendFailed: Code no gree resend. Abeg try again.
verifyCodeScreen.modalSuccessDesc: Dem don verify your email successfully. You fit log in now and start to use your account
